summary: A rebellious high school student sees his life take a strange turn when he goes to the grocery store and someone leaves a baby in his shopping cart, along with a note claiming he's the father.
cast: Keun-Suk Jang|Shin-Ho Byun|Jae-Hwan Choi|Go Gyu-Pil|Jeong Gyu-Su|Joo Ho|Se-hong Jeon|Min-sung Jung|Jang Jung-Hee|Kim Jung-Nan|Hae-yeon Kil|Byung-Ok Kim|Do-Yeon Kim|Ku-Ra Kim|Yang-woo Kim|Oh Kwang-rok|Cheol-min Lee|Mun-shik Lee|Mason Moon Moorhouse|Hyeon-suk Park|Myung-Soo Park|Ha-Yoon Song|Min-Hyung Song|Ji-yeon Yu
title: Ahgiwa na
